titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress opposing the proposal by the United States Department of State to relocate the United States Embassy to the Holy See.
Expressing the sense of Congress opposing the proposal by the United States Department of State to relocate the United States Embassy to the Holy See.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Opposes Department of State efforts to close the freestanding U.S. embassy located at Aventine Hill (U.S. Embassy to the Holy See).
